h2_title: Zhu Bajie Boss Fight and Guide - Second Encounter
content: Once he's out of the mud and on the surface, he'll transform again, this time into a large rhino, and begin to charge at you. If this wasn't bad enough, he'll summon two copies to charge just behind him on either side, making dodging extremely risky.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Zhu_Bajie_(Boss_Fight).md', within the main section titled 'Zhu Bajie (Boss Fight)', specifically from the subsection 'Zhu Bajie Boss Fight and Guide - Second Encounter'.
The content is as follows:
Once he's out of the mud and on the surface, he'll transform again, this time into a large rhino, and begin to charge at you. If this wasn't bad enough, he'll summon two copies to charge just behind him on either side, making dodging extremely risky.
